thread.section_title: Lucky Tackle Box Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lucky Tackle Box | www.luckytacklebox.com
thread.title: Brice Chauvin
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Brice Chauvin

author: Brice Chauvin
title: Brice Chauvin
text:
A+ customer service with speedy response. I was unable to input a discount lure code at checkout while purchasing a new subscription. I called customer service, filed a report, and was contacted in less than 24 hours by NICHOLE. She made the correction needed in a timely fashion and it is very much appreciated. Give Nichole a pat on the back for me...better yet give her a paid day off.
Thanks again LTB
